posts.post_content:
@ WhiteyMcFly  
There are many cards I would use this on over a simple creature.  
for Example, almost any Planeswalker, [Maze of Ith](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Maze of Ith), [Grave Pact](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grave Pact), [Crucible of Worlds](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crucible of Worlds), In the case of Doom Blade vs This, any creature not just nonblack ones.  
  
and those are just ones off the top of my head. there is so many more things that make me happier to see this over a worthless Doomblade.

Posted By: Nukeleo (4/3/2011 11:22:54 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This is the most beautiful and elegant removal spell ever printed. It's a little strange, but I always feel "safe" with one of these in my hand. I know I'll be able to handle almost anything my opponent throws in my direction.
  
   
[Maelstrom Pulse](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Maelstrom Pulse) is good, but what if I need to take care of a [Tolarian Academy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tolarian Academy) or some other nuisance land?
  
   
Vindicate is and will always be the best removal spell ever printed.
posts.html:
This is the most beautiful and elegant removal spell ever printed. It's a little strange, but I always feel "safe" with one of these in my hand. I know I'll be able to handle almost anything my opponent throws in my direction.

Maelstrom Pulse is good, but what if I need to take care of a Tolarian Academy or some other nuisance land?

Vindicate is and will always be the best removal spell ever printed.

posts.post_content:
Balanced? Like hell. This is about as balanced as Force of Will. Nonetheless, it'll be a mainstay of the game forever- Designers and Developers for years to come will think   
  
"you know, I hope this new card 'X' doesn't blow up in our faces, but EVEN if it does, thank God we printed that 'Break Glass Here' card back in Apocalypse. We should totally reprint that in the Return To Ravnica set. Everyone would go nuts, and it would keep the failsafe online through Modern for a LONG time."  
  
  
You wanna know who's a permanent, kiddies? [Jace, the Mind Sculptor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jace, the Mind Sculptor). Yeah.
